entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is mentioned as a person who is in the Order and is being tortured by Voldemort. He is also referred to as Sirius Black.

entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the one who knows that Sirius is in the Order and is trying to keep him out of the way.

relationships.description: Sirius is being tortured by Voldemort, as seen in a vision.
Kreacher was told to keep Sirius out of the way by the Malfoys on Voldemort's instructions.
Voldemort instructed Kreacher to keep Sirius out of the way.
Sirius was trying to tend to Buckbeak when Harry appeared in the fire.
